snippet.title: Sacred Seasons MMORPG Gameplay
snippet.description:
Sacred Seasons is a free to play MMORPG. The Heartlands was once a peaceful place, but now legends says there is a corrupted great spirit, driven mad and set loose upon the world. Pockets of this madness are beginning to sprout up, and spread like a cancerous plague. It's up to you and your friends to answer the call to arms and defend the Heartlands.

Use your mouse to click somewhere and your character will move there. Click on White portals to go to a new screen. Click Red portals to get into a battle! Use the Character menu at the top to customize your character.

LINK: http://www.kongregate.com/games/jamieyg3/sacred-seasons-mmorpg
_____________________________________________________________
TAGS: MMORPG MMO Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game Gameplay Gaming Kongregate Newgrounds Online Browser Free To Play Fighting Monsters Friends Store Skills Map Character Customize
